posts.post_content: I'm looking for T207's of Doc White and Irving Lewis to complete my set.  Let me know your price, or I have duplicate T207's to trade including some tough ones like Donlin and Weaver available.  Will make you a good deal.  Thanks.

Hey Ron,

sent you email(s) in response, but the first (at least) seems to have bounced - let me know if you received any.

Thanks, and congrats (in advance) on your set completion!
--
Mike
